Overview

This article provides information about billable services and additional support tasks that may incur costs for customers. It includes a comprehensive table of various tasks, their classifications, effort estimates, and proposed price tags.

 

Information

This guide outlines the general approach to support services, including those that may be billable. It aims to clarify what is included in standard support and what may result in additional costs for customers.

  • General Approach to Support Services
  • Billable Services Table
  • Additional Considerations

 

General Approach to Support Services

The approach to support services is based on how support is defined in contracts. It is important to have a clear definition of what is included in standard support without additional costs. Customers need to be informed that some support tasks will incur additional charges. A grace period may be implemented to avoid any discussions regarding unexpected costs.

Additional Considerations

Some tasks are not considered support tasks and should be handled by Professional Services (PS) or Customer Success Managers (CSM). These include:

  • Implementation consulting
  • Consultation for simpler solutions
  • Moving projects from one installation to another
  • Account management tasks

For tasks related to moving installations to their own database instance due to high workload and slow performance, additional technical costs and configuration efforts may be required. These should be assessed on a case-by-case basis.

 

FAQ

What is included in standard support?

Standard support includes [specific details to be added based on contract definitions]. Any tasks or services not explicitly mentioned in the standard support agreement may incur additional costs.

How are customers informed about potential additional costs?

Customers should be informed about potential additional costs for support tasks that fall outside the standard support agreement. A grace period may be implemented to avoid any discussions regarding unexpected costs.

What is the hourly rate for Technical Consultants?

The hourly rate for Technical Consultants is 156.25 Euro.
